title: Part One: The Deadliest School in History
itunes:title: Part One: The Deadliest School in History
description:
Robert is joined by Joelle Monique to discuss the School of the Americas.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/the_americas/el-salvador-mozote-trial-trump/2020/03/13/09d89632-64a5-11ea-8a8e-5c5336b32760_story.html

  5. https://www.latimes.com/world/mexico-americas/la-fg-guatemala-war-aftermath-20180903-story.html
